item.title: Golang testing â€” golden file
item.description: Tests are all about maintainability and readability. You want the least visual noise possible and it should not be a hassle to maintain. When testing functions that output a long of string, in case of a command line output testing, readability and maintainance tend to be tricky to achieve. The problem As an example let's say we want to test out the output of a command that displays a list as a table.
